data.actual_result: The option to deafen is there and when you use it you can't hear anything, and the Desktop user will see a Deafen icon on his end
data.expected_result: It shouldn't be possible to deafen in a DM, so this option shouldn't be there to begin with. At least it should not be working
data.short_description: There's an option to deafen yourself in a DM through the persistent notification, and it actually works
data.steps_to_repro: - Start or join a DM call with a Desktop user - Look at the persistent notification on your phone - Notice there's a deafen option. Tap on it
